query: TRANS AM BIKE RACE gravel race Astoria

videos.title: 2019 Trans America Bike Race
videos.description: Racing from Astoria, Oregon to Yorktown, Virginia, through ten states, over five mountain ranges, and covering 4,200 miles.

videos.title: TransAmerica Bike Race 2016 Trailer
videos.description:
Ken Simpson and Terry Roe completed the 2016 Trans-America bike ride across the country. Please join us for a special movie presentation of their exciting adventure! 

For more information go to https://www.facebook.com/onyxfinancial/.
